description: Louise Halevy is the daughter of Barry Halevy, the leader of a fossil fuel export regulation watchdog group. Because of her family`s wealthy lifestyle, she possess somewhat of a selfish behaviour and often demands people to get what she wants. A year before the event of the anime series, both she and her father were protected by Celestial Being when a terrorist organisation are planning to target Louise`s father for assassination. This was Setsuna F Seiei`s first task since joining the organization to prevent the assassination of Barry Halevy and protecting his daughter. Although Louise and her father were protected by Setsuna, they have never met each other face-to-face, until a year later she was introduced to him by Saji Crossroad.
name: Louise Halevy
